story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1101_0100_20:
The battle has finally begun, but it’s starting with
a bit of a shake-up!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1101_0200_20: Rather than work together as a team of three...
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1101_0300_20:
each Trainer has decided to take on another
one-on-one!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_0800_10: You too! I can see you’ve gone through a lot!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_0900_10: But there’s no need for words now.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_1000_10:
This battle will determine who is the stronger of
the two of us!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You and Metagross seem to have honed your skills
even further!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_1400_10: Our harsh adventures taught us something.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
And that is to become the world’s strongest sync
pair—nothing else!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_1700_10:
It seems the greatest achievement of your
adventures isn’t your newfound strength...
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_1800_10: but your pure will to win.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_1900_10: Allow me to respond to your determination!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I’ll show you plenty of the water illusions
performed by me and my Pokémon!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2200_10: Nothing like the last time we battled!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2300_10: And yet you seem so calm.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2400_10: You think you’re unbeatable, don’t you?
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I wouldn’t say that. It’s just that I’m not
particularly fond of losing...
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2600_10: So, yes. I plan to win.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Besides, you’re not the only one who’s gotten
stronger.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2800_10:
We haven’t been sitting around doing nothing,
you know!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_2900_10:
As I expected, you’re not someone who I can
easily win against.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_3000_10:
But even so, both Garchomp and I are always
aiming for the top!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_3100_10:
We’ll continue to battle on even bigger stages and
see how bright our lights can shine!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_3200_10: Dragons are sacred and legendary creatures.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_3300_10:
I’m proud to be partners with and battle beside
one like you, Dragonite.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_3400_10:
As the strongest Trainer, I, Lance—the dragon
master—accept your challenge!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Battling with Metagross fills me with inexplicable
excitement.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_3600_10:
Our shared experiences allow us to polish
our potential as a sync pair to a beautiful shine.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_3700_10:
And we’ll shine as brilliantly as any precious
stone!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_4300_10: (I sense a strong power coming from that light...)
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_4500_10: I-is this the true power of sync stones ultimate?!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Congratulations, Champions, for mastering the
power of the sync stones ultimate and establishing
such strong bonds with your Pokémon!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_5100_10: That’s it! The battle is over!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_5200_10: A beautiful, powerful, captivating battle at that!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_5300_10:
What’s more, the Champions have drawn out the
true power of the sync stones ultimate by
deepening their bonds with their Pokémon!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_5400_10: Those outfits have been blessed by Arceus...
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_5600_10:
I must admit—all three of you put on a beautiful
display of power!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_5700_10: We all had a genuine desire to win.
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_5800_10:
However, if the power of your bonds was the
deciding factor in who won and who lost, then I
gracefully admit my defeat!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_5900_10: Yeah! That was an awesome battle!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_6100_10:
There’s no doubt that your powers were
truly incredible!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_6400_10:
The bonds you and your Pokémon showed us were
also impressive!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_6500_10: I hope we continue to inspire each other...
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1001_6600_10:
to keep shining as brightly as we possibly can
as sync pairs!
story_arceus_01_07000/2401_1101_6700_20:
Let’s give another round of applause to these three
sync pairs who clinched a victory with their sync
stones ultimate!
